name: Delve (itch) (Jordan Millett)
description:
Description : 

Delve is going to be a first person procedurally generated dungeon crawler with skills that you can level up and items to collect and use.

As of right now this game is not even close to being done and the current playable version is consists of mostly models and ideas.

Controls : 

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

CTRL - Crouch

Q - Magic

Mouse1 - Attack

Mouse2 - Block

ESC - Pause Menu

Tab - Inventory
